about_the_game:
Beyond The Limits is a project in a very early stage of development, an open-world crime-style game where freedom and action will be at the core of the experience. Currently, the game is in its initial stages, and we are working on laying the foundations for a dynamic and exciting world. During this Early Access phase, your feedback as a player will be crucial in helping us shape the future of the game.

Current state of the game:

  • Basic open world: The map is in development, with an initial environment to explore. It is not yet fully populated or detailed.

  • Vehicle theft: We are implementing a basic system for stealing and driving vehicles. (In development).

  • Weapon system: We are working on integrating a basic arsenal of weapons. (In development).

  • Performance: We are optimizing the game to ensure a smooth experience, although bugs and technical issues may exist in this early phase.

Future features (in planning):

  • NPC interaction: We plan to add a character interaction system in future updates.

  • Story mode and missions: We are designing a narrative and main missions, but they are not yet implemented.

  • More vehicles and weapons: We will expand the options available in the game as development progresses.

  • World improvements: We will add more details, activities, and challenges to the map in future updates.

Beyond The Limits is an evolving project, and we are committed to building a solid and fun game with the help of the community. We appreciate your patience and support as we work through this initial phase. Join us and be part of this journey from the beginning!

content_descriptors.notes:
"Beyond The Limits contains mature content, including:

Violence: Realistic depictions of gunfights, physical altercations, and criminal activities such as theft and confrontations with the law.

Drug and Alcohol Use: Some characters may consume alcohol or illegal substances in certain situations, reflecting a crime-driven and street-life environment.

Strong Language: Frequent use of profanity and explicit dialogue.

Mature Themes: The game explores themes related to organized crime, delinquency, and the consequences of illegal actions.

The game does not currently include depictions of sex, sexual abuse, non-consensual sex, or self-harm. While some NPCs in the beach area of the map wear bikinis, this is not explicit or sexual in nature. However, please note that the game may include sexual content in future updates, which will be clearly communicated to players.

Players should be aware that the game is designed for an adult audience due to its themes and content."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8650U CPU @ 1.90GHz 2.11 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce Mx130
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: El juego fue probado solo en una pc con estas características ,los requisitos mínimos pueden ser menores

short_description: Beyond The Limits is an open-world crime-style game featuring vehicle theft mechanics, a weapon system, and NPC interactions. Coming soon, it will include main missions and a story mode. Experience an adventure full of action and freedom!
